timeline.bodyText: I think you forgot to remove this.
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText:
I did intentionally not remove this.
The keypad has a function that it can act as an input device. To do that first the enterTerminalMode() action has to be executed and then the keypad will receive an event if a button is pressed.
If the keypad does not enter terminal mode, it will stay offline.
